python:
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from mqtt import *
from event_manager import *

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V2_humidity_(humidity):
  global temperature, light, door
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr((int(humidity)))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Humi:')

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V2_temperature_(temperature):
  global humidity, light, door
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr((int(temperature)))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Temp:')

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V2_light_(light):
  global humidity, temperature, door
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(12, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr((int(light)))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(7, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('ligh:')

def on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V2_door_(door):
  global humidity, temperature, light
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(12, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr((int(door)))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(7, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('door:')

event_manager.reset()

if True:
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('Hello')
  mqtt.connect_wifi('Tien Trung', '0914020981')
  mqtt.connect_broker(server='mqtt.ohstem.vn', port=1883, username='thinhdadn', password='hehe')
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()

while True:
  mqtt.on_receive_message('V2/humidity', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V2_humidity_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('V2/temperature', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V2_temperature_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('V2/light', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V2_light_)
  mqtt.on_receive_message('V2/door', on_mqtt_message_receive_callback__V2_door_)
  mqtt.check_message()
  event_manager.run()
name: recv
